name: Big Jumper! Little Runner!
description:
Big Jumper! Little Runner!

is a 2D Platformer game I made for the 3rd BTP Game Jam! This is my first ever *finished* game using Unity and the first ever Game Jam that I've participated in. I hope you enjoy :D

How it fits the theme "Less is More" When you shrink you gain more speed and thus "Less size" is "More speed"
